views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11, 12 and 13. Compatible with all devices (including A12).

QuickPrefs is a little -yet useful- tweak that lets you quickly access tweak preferences with Force Touch on Settings app. Are you often changing settings of a specific tweak and are tired of searching it in your -so long- settings page? Or you're a tweak developer who is currently working on its tweak setting page? QuickPrefs is for you! You can add up to 8 tweak names that will be added to the stock Force Touch Settings items.

Since version 1.1 you can also set custom paths like "General/Keyboard" that will bring you to stock preferences panes.

- Add up to 8 items to Force Touch Settings.app menu
- Choose whether you want to show items before or after stock items
- Remove stock items to get more space for your items

QuickPrefs is open source.

Don't forget to follow me on Twitter @AnthoPak to get live updates!

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter to submit bug reports or feature requests.

Note: be sure to have Cephei installed for settings to work.

- iOS 13 support - Add "Respring", "Safe Mode" and "UICache" items which will perform said command - Custom paths allowing to dive into all Settings.app panes
- Support for shuffle and PreferenceOrganizer2
- Increase the number of items to 8
- Option to remove stock items
